description: Explore how Arbitrum, a prominent Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution, is enhancing privacy in decentralized applications. This article discusses Arbitrum's role in balancing blockchain transparency with privacy, its integration of zero-knowledge proofs, and the real-world applications in sectors like finance, supply chain, and healthcare.
keywords: Arbitrum, blockchain privacy, Ethereum Layer 2, decentralized applications, zero-knowledge proofs, zk-rollups, private transactions, shielded contracts, financial services, supply chain management, healthcare, Web3, blockchain transparency
title: Exploring Arbitrum's Role in Enhancing Blockchain Privacy
